intro.p: We assume that you have Castle Project assemblies on your local machine. If you don't, we encourage you to download the MSI installer distribution, as it makes the assemblies visible to Visual Studio.

Add references to the following assemblies:
Castle.Core.dll
Castle.MicroKernel.dll
Castle.Windsor.dll
Castle.DynamicProxy.dll
If you are using another environment or compiling with NAnt, make sure assemblies above are referenced from the Castle installation directory.
Proceed with Registering components through code.
